gurmukhi: ਚਰਨ ਸਰਨਿ ਗੁਰ ੲੇਕ ਪੈਡਾ ਜਾੲਿ ਚਲ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਕੋਟਿ ਪੈਡਾ ਅਾਗੇ ਹੋੲਿ ਲੇਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Charan Sarani Gur Ayk Paidaa Jaai Chala , Satigur Koti Paidaa Aagay Hoi Layt Hai ?
translation: A disciple who walks one step towards Guru to take his refuge and goes to him with devotion and humility, Guru advances to receive him (devotee) by taking million steps.

gurmukhi: ੲੇਕ ਬਾਰ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਸਿਮਰਨ ਮਾਤ੍ਰ ਸਿਮਰਨ ਤਾਹਿ ਬਾਰੰਬਾਰ ਗੁਰ ਹੇਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Ayk Baar Satigur Mantr Simaran Maatra , Simaran Taahi Baaranbaar Gur Hayt Hai ?
translation: He who unites with the Lord by remembering the incantation of the Guru even once, the True Guru remembers him millions of time.

gurmukhi: ਭਾਵਨੀ ਭਗਤਿ ਭਾੲਿ ਕੳੁਡੀ ਅਗ੍ਰਭਾਗਿ ਰਾਖੈ ਤਾਹਿ ਗੁਰ ਸਰਬ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਦਾਨ ਦੇਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Bhaavanee Bhagati Bhaai Kaudee Agrabhaagi Raakhai , Taahi Gur Sarab Nidhaan Daan Dayt Hai ?
translation: He who makes an offering of even a shell before the True Guru with loving worship and faith, the True Guru blesses him with the countless treasures of invaluable wealth that is Naam.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਦੲਿਅਾ ਨਿਧਿ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਬੋਧਿ ਨਮੋ ਨਮੋ ਨਮੋ ਨਮੋ ਨੇਤ ਨੇਤ ਨੇਤ ਹੈ ||੧੧੧||
transliteration: Satigur Daiaa Nidhi Mahimaa Agaadhi Bodhi , Namo Namo Namo Namo Nayt Nayt Nayt Hai ?111?
translation: The True Guru is a repository of compassion that is beyond description and understanding. Therefore myriad salutations to Him because there is no one else like Him. (111)
